name: Castle Of Cards
description:
Relax and build the nicest, the tallest, the most perfect house of cards you can imagine.
You have two 52 cards decks to build (or try to do so) the house of cards of your dreams.
Castle of Cards was made around multitouch input to recreate the real-life experience including some of the required patience and induced frustration :)

With a perfect balance of realism and simplification it is easy to pick but hard to master.

Pick a scenario from a growing a list to build your Castle of Cards !

Select "Competitive" mode to compete online via GameCenter and build the tallest card tower with a limited number of "undo" actions.

Pick music from your library or enjoy the classic piano pieces the game comes with.

Reach us on our website, Facebook , Twitter or via email at coc@frozenpepper.it with suggestions and feedback, we really hope you'll like it and help us shape future updates (Harder difficulty modes coming really soon as first planned update).

TIPS:
- Hold the cards with your thumbs and use the index fingers to rotate them for the most precise placing.
- You can adjust the offset between the card and your touch in the settings panel.
- Another very useful tip (works in real life too) is to first release one card (while leaning on second one) and then very gently adjust the second one before releasing it.
